reviewText: False advertisement. It says blu Ray but I received a DVD. The movie is good but description needs to be updated so there is no incorrect expectations
The one star is not for the movie but for the wrong advertisement. The product is clearly advertised as a blu ray disc but turned out to be a regular dvd.
I never expected this caliber of acting from Varun Dhawan, but he did a great job.  The film was interesting, had a great plot, how morals become displaced are deeply portrayed in this film.
